name: Cloppy and the Great Internet Adventure
name_original: Cloppy and the Great Internet Adventure
description:
Click "Run Game" to be carried away on a Great Internet Adventure with Cloppy, your personal AI assistant who totally does wasn't scheming. Really, not at all!

Cloppy and the Great Internet Adventure is a Twine game created by Venus Studios, as the final project for Tufts University  Experimental College Fall 2020 course XP Earned: Video Games, Performance, and Cultural Memory taught by Professor Peter Spearman. 

Venus Studios is Meghan Kloud, Jacob Elliot, and Wing Ting (Jo) Chung.

Venus is a cat named after a planet.
